title: BitmapIcon with UriSource="about:blank" causes app crash in edgehtml.dll
body:
If I use anywhere in my UWP app <BitmapIcon> with UriSource="about:blank", this can happen when using databinding, the app crashes when navigating to other page which contains WebView.
Tested on Windows 10 Creators Update, VS2017 15.2.
100% repro is available in ZIP below.
https://1drv.ms/u/s!AlURSa6JiyiVo4lNj0cWfTva0_dN1A
